item.title: About
item.description: Hello My name is Haris, and I’m the owner of this website. Here, I share my writings on various subjects and hobbies, particularly programming, learning, reading, and music. I don’t post often and instead focus on depth and quality of content. So, the best way to stay up-to-date is through the site’s RSS. Although it may not be much, thank you for taking the time to visit. To reach me:

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Welcome! This my personal website and its initial setup right now: GitHub as host, Hugo as the blogging engine, and this theme heavily modified . Although there is plenty to fix and finish, a start’s a start. Hugo definitely presents a far steeper learning curve than Jekyll, and its benefits are not apparent yet. But, giving any tech a proper runthrough is necessary, and I consider a proper runthrough as getting to a “production” MVP.
